summary: Website for Ryuuk Gaming - a console gaming channel
architectural_notes: Gaming channel website with focus on console gaming content
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Gaming hero banner with console controllers and dynamic gaming elements (hero-banner.dim_1920x600.png)
- Ryuuk Gaming logo with bold gaming aesthetic (logo.dim_400x400.png)
- Console gaming themed background pattern for sections (gaming-pattern.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create a homepage that introduces Ryuuk Gaming as a console gaming channel with a hero section, channel description, and call-to-action to explore content
Build a games showcase section displaying featured console games with cover images, titles, and brief descriptions
Create a videos/content section where gaming videos or streams can be featured with thumbnails, titles, and links
Implement an about section explaining the Ryuuk Gaming channel's focus on console gaming, mission, and community
Add a contact or community section with social media links and ways to connect with the gaming channel
Design the website with a gaming-themed aesthetic featuring bold, energetic colors (avoiding blue and purple), dynamic typography, and dark mode styling that suits console gaming content

new_feature_requests.summary: Create website for console gaming channel
